title: Understanding the Columns Area
text: The columns area in a PivotTable is used to display data fields horizontally across the top of the table. It helps in organizing data into columns based on the selected field.

title: What Fields Go in the Columns Area?
text: Fields that are added to the columns area should typically contain categorical data that you want to compare across different categories.

hintAnswer: fields directly added to the columns fields should contain summary numeric area
title: Identifying the Correct Answer
text: Which of the following statements correctly describes the fields added to the columns area in a PivotTable?
choices: report filter and filter button in the PivotTable, representing a subset that meets a selection criterion
fields directly added to the columns fields should contain summary numeric area
fields added to the rows area become subsets of the first field
fields added to the values area must contain numeric data from the source data
